protein.specific_function: In the presence of calcium, binds to target cell membranes. Inserts into target cell membranes and forms pores, and so contributes to cytolysis and apoptosis of target cells

reference.reference_text: Lichtenheld MG, Olsen KJ, Lu P, Lowrey DM, Hameed A, Hengartner H, Podack ER: Structure and function of human perforin. Nature. 1988 Sep 29;335(6189):448-51.
